headline.main: How the Amazon’s Cashews and Cacao Point to Cultivation by the Ancients
headline.print_headline: How the Amazon’s Cashews and Cacao Point to Cultivation by the Ancients

lead_paragraph: The Trump administration would slash programs aimed at slowing climate change and improving water safety and air quality, while eliminating thousands of jobs, according to a draft of the Environmental Protection Agency budget proposal obtained by The Associated Press.
